Package com.msc.serverbrowser.util.samp

Class SampQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msc.serverbrowser.util.samp.SampQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SampQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Provides Methods for retrieving information from a SA-MP Server.
    Author:
    Marcel
    See Also:
    Wiki SA-MP - Query Mechanism

    • Constructor Detail

      • SampQuery

        public SampQuery​(java.lang.String serverAddress,
                 int serverPort,
                 int timeout)
          throws java.net.SocketException,
                 java.net.UnknownHostException
        Configures the socket and the address that will be used for doing the queries.
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - hostname / ip
        serverPort - port
        timeout - the maximum time, that the socket tries connecting
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - Thrown if the connection is closed unexpectedly / has never been opened properly
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the host is unknown

      • SampQuery

        public SampQuery​(java.lang.String serverAddress,
                 int serverPort)
          throws java.net.SocketException,
                 java.net.UnknownHostException
        Configures the socket and the address.
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - hostname / ip
        serverPort - port
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - if the connection couldn't be established
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the host is unknown

      • getBasicServerInfo

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> getBasicServerInfo​()
        Returns a String array, containing information about the server.
        Returns:
        String[]:
        Index 0: password (0 or 1)
        Index 1: players
        Index 2: maxplayers
        Index 3: hostname
        Index 4: gamemode
        Index 5: language

      • getBasicPlayerInfo

        public java.util.Optional<java.util.List<Player>> getBasicPlayerInfo​()
        Returns an Optional of a List of Player objects, containing all players on the server.
        Returns:
        an Optional containg a List of Players or an empty Optional incase the query failed.

      • getServersRules

        public java.util.Optional<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getServersRules​()
        Returns a Map containing all server rules. The Key is always the rules name.
        Returns:
        a Map containing all server rules

      • wrapReply

        private static java.nio.ByteBuffer wrapReply​(byte[] reply)

        Wraps the received bytes in a ByteBuffer for easier usage.

        Contents of the byte array:
        • Byte 0 - 3: "SAMP"
        • Byte 4 - 7: IP
        • Byte 8 - 9: Port
        • Byte 10: Message Type
        • Byte 11+: Data

        Because the Data contains multiple informations that we do not care for as of now, we are setting the byte buffers initial position to eleven.

        Parameters:
        the - byte array to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the ByteBuffer that wraps the byte array

      • getPing

        public long getPing​()
        Returns the server's ping.
        Returns:
        ping

      • receiveBytes

        private byte[] receiveBytes​()
        Reseives a package from the server
